talents.option1: Half Track Bonus Speed to Allies
talents.option2: +2s Silence on Hit With Shadow Walk

abilities.desc: Hurls a deadly shuriken at an enemy unit, dealing damage and mini-stunning the target.  The shuriken will bounce to any Tracked units who are within a 1200 radius of each other.  Deals bonus damage to Tracked targets.
abilities.name: Shuriken Toss

abilities.desc: Bounty Hunter plans his next hit, dealing bonus damage and stealing some unreliable gold.
abilities.name: Jinada

abilities.desc: Bounty Hunter becomes invisible and gains the ability to move through other units until he attacks or uses an ability.  If he breaks the invisibility with an attack, that attack will slow the target's movement speed.
abilities.name: Shadow Walk
abilities.notes: Will not break most channeling of spells upon activation.

abilities.desc: Tracks an enemy hero, granting True Sight of the target, and information on how much gold it is carrying. Bounty Hunter moves fast when near the tracked unit and deals critical strikes when attacking it. If the target dies, Bounty Hunter and nearby heroes collect a bonus bounty of gold. Casting Track does not take you out of invisibility.
abilities.name: Track
